## Description {#details}

Tunable parameters for passes in the default pipelines.

Definition at line 43 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/passbuilder-h">PassBuilder.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### PipelineTuningOptions() {#acb41cc3f45423b2af2334a6e2b0c087e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="PipelineTuningOptions::PipelineTuningOptions ()">
Constructor sets pipeline tuning defaults based on cl::opts.

Each option can be set in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passbuilder">PassBuilder</a> when using a LLVM as a library.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/passbuilder-h/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/passbuilder-h">PassBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderpipelines-cpp/#l00314">314</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderpipelines-cpp">PassBuilderPipelines.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Attributes

### CallGraphProfile {#ab02f5f300988ddd7c25206b663f59801}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PipelineTuningOptions::CallGraphProfile">
Tuning option to enable/disable call graph profile.

Its default value is that of the flag: <code>-enable-npm-call-graph-profile</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/passbuilder-h/#l00077">77</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/passbuilder-h">PassBuilder.h</a>.

### ForgetAllSCEVInLoopUnroll {#ac4261b710708d3ffd351693d268dbc2b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::PipelineTuningOptions::ForgetAllSCEVInLoopUnroll">
Tuning option to forget all <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> loops in LoopUnroll.

Its default value is that of the flag: <code>-forget-scev-loop-unroll</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/passbuilder-h/#l00065">65</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/passbuilder-h">PassBuilder.h</a>.
